subject: Can't log in to my account - Invalid Credentials
body: I'm certain I'm using the right password, but the system keeps saying 'Invalid Credentials'. What should I do? I am trying to log in from Chrome.

subject: Forgot my password, reset link missing
body: I used the 'Forgot Password' link 10 minutes ago but the email hasn't arrived. I checked my spam folder.

subject: My email verification link expired
body: I just checked my inbox and realized the verification link for my new account has expired. Can you resend it?

subject: Need a refund for accidental annual purchase
body: I accidentally selected the annual plan instead of the monthly plan. I need a refund for the difference or the entire amount if possible.

subject: Payment declined while attempting to renew subscription
body: I received a notification that my credit card payment failed. I've updated the card details but it still shows 'declined'.

subject: How to change my registered email address?
body: I'm changing my primary work email and need to update the email associated with my account. Where can I find the setting?

subject: Feature suggestion: Integration with Google Drive
body: It would be extremely helpful if we could link and sync files directly from Google Drive. Please consider adding this integration.

subject: App crashing on startup on Android 13
body: The mobile application crashes immediately after I tap the icon. My phone is running Android 13. I've tried reinstalling it.

subject: Locating the API Key
body: I need to set up a third-party integration but I cannot locate my API Key in the settings. Where is it stored?

subject: General system error - 'Error 500'
body: I got an 'Error 500' message when trying to access the Dashboard. Not sure what this means.

subject: 2FA code rejected, can't log in
body: My two-factor authentication code from the Google Authenticator app is not being accepted. I'm locked out.

subject: Password reset link expired immediately
body: I clicked the link right away but got a message saying the password reset link has expired. Can you help?

subject: Email verification not received in inbox or spam
body: I signed up two hours ago. I have not received the verification email. It's not in my spam folder.

subject: How to upgrade my plan from Pro to Enterprise
body: We need to upgrade our team to the Enterprise tier for additional features. What is the process?

subject: My payment was declined for an unknown reason
body: I know there are funds on my card, but the payment for the monthly subscription failed. The card issuer did not notify me of a decline.

subject: Change notification preferences
body: I'm receiving too many email notifications. I want to turn off the promotional emails but keep the billing alerts.

subject: Request: Custom user roles
body: We need a feature to define custom user roles beyond the default Admin/Editor/Viewer roles.

subject: Bug: Image assets not loading on shared link
body: When I share a project link, the images and embedded videos are not loading for the recipient. It just shows broken links.

subject: How do I cancel my subscription before the next charge?
body: I want to make sure I cancel my subscription before the next renewal date. Where is the cancellation button?

subject: Website extremely slow today
body: The site is taking over a minute to load simple pages. Is there a known outage or is the service experiencing high traffic?

subject: Account locked after failed login attempts
body: I tried logging in too many times with the wrong password and now my account is locked. How long until I can try again?

subject: Password reset link not working in Gmail
body: I'm using the correct link but clicking it in Gmail does nothing. Should I try a different browser?

subject: Can't find the invoice for last month's payment
body: I need to download the invoice for the payment made on the 5th of last month for my accounting records.

subject: Unexpected overage charge on my bill
body: I see an extra charge on my bill labeled 'Overage Fee'. I thought I was within my plan limits. Can you explain this?

subject: How to update my credit card details?
body: My old credit card is expiring next week. I need instructions on where to update my payment information to the new card.

subject: Change my display name
body: My current display name is incorrect. I'd like to update it to my full name, John Smith. Where can I do this?

subject: Request for data export
body: I'm closing my account soon. I need a full export of all my stored data and documents before I proceed.

subject: Bug report: Co-editing feature not working
body: My collaborator and I can't simultaneously edit a document. It keeps throwing an error message about a lock on the file.

subject: Where is the documentation for the API?
body: I'm trying to find the official documentation for connecting to your API. I need information on endpoints and parameters.

subject: My discount code is not applying
body: I have a new customer discount code 'WELCOME20' but when I enter it at checkout, the price doesn't change.

subject: Login failed due to CAPTCHA issue
body: The CAPTCHA keeps failing when I try to log in. I've reset my password but I'm still stuck on the login screen.

subject: I can't receive password reset email
body: My email provider must be blocking your reset emails. I've checked every folder. How can I get access to my account?

subject: Can you manually verify my account?
body: I've been waiting two days for the verification email. Can you manually verify my account so I can start using the service?

subject: Question about annual vs. monthly pricing
body: Is there a difference in features between the annual and monthly billing cycles, or is it just the price?

subject: How to resolve a payment decline for my business card
body: My business credit card was declined. I need to know why, as I need to use the service immediately for work.

subject: I need to delete my account and data
body: I want my account and all associated personal data completely and permanently deleted from your servers.

subject: Feature request: Better search filters
body: The current search function is too basic. Could you implement advanced filters like date range and file type filters?

subject: Technical issue: App freezing on iOS
body: The app freezes completely after I open a certain file type. I'm using the latest iOS update.

subject: How to find tutorial videos
body: I'm a new user and want to learn how to use the advanced features. Where can I find video tutorials or training?

subject: Error 404: Page not found when clicking a menu link
body: I clicked on the 'Reports' link in the main navigation and received an 'Error 404' page. Is this an internal link error?

subject: Login issue after reactivating account
body: I recovered my deactivated account, but now my login credentials aren't being recognized. Can you check my status?

subject: Can't complete password reset
body: The link took me to a page that required a security question I don't remember. I need another way to reset my password.

subject: I need to re-verify my email
body: I changed my primary email address but never got the verification link. Please advise on how to get it resent.

subject: Subscription expired unexpectedly
body: My account status suddenly says 'Subscription Expired'. I thought I was set up for automatic renewal. What happened?

subject: Unrecognized charge on bank statement
body: I see a charge from your company on my bank statement that I don't recall authorizing. What is this $50 charge for?

subject: How to update team member roles
body: I'm an Admin and I need to change one team member's role from 'Editor' to 'Viewer'. How do I manage user roles?

subject: Feature request: Keyboard shortcuts
body: Please add more keyboard shortcuts for navigating the application. It would greatly improve workflow speed.

subject: Bug: Time zone is incorrect in activity logs
body: All the activity timestamps in my account are showing the wrong time zone (they are 8 hours off). I need them to reflect EST.

subject: What is the policy for data retention?
body: If I delete my account, how long is my data backed up before it is permanently removed?

subject: System status check - Slow loading
body: Is the system down or is there an ongoing maintenance? My dashboard has been loading very slowly all morning.

subject: Cannot log in with correct credentials (possible hack)
body: I suspect my account may have been compromised. My login is failing even though I'm sure of the password.

subject: Password reset email went to spam
body: I found the password reset email in my spam folder, but by the time I clicked it, the link was invalid.

subject: How to change from monthly to annual billing
body: I want to switch my subscription plan from monthly payments to the annual discounted rate.

subject: Need to downgrade my current subscription plan
body: I want to downgrade from the Business plan to the Pro plan. When will this change take effect?

subject: I cannot update my billing address
body: I recently moved and I need to update my billing address for the invoices. I can't find the correct place in settings.

subject: Add secondary email for recovery
body: I want to add a secondary email address to my account in case I lose access to my primary one. Where do I set this up?

subject: Feature suggestion: Bulk file downloading
body: Allow us to select multiple files and download them as a single ZIP archive. This is essential for my workflow.

subject: Bug: Failed upload with large file
body: Every time I try to upload a file over 200MB, the upload process fails at about 90% completion. Is there a size limit?

subject: Where is my referral link?
body: I want to refer a friend to the service. Where can I find my personal referral link to share?

subject: Need help with accessibility features
body: I use a screen reader and am having trouble navigating the menu. Are there specific accessibility settings I can enable?

subject: Login failed after using a new browser
body: I tried logging in from Safari (I usually use Chrome) and it failed, saying my credentials were wrong. Why would this happen?

subject: Trouble receiving password reset email on custom domain
body: I use an email with a custom domain and the password reset emails aren't reaching me. How can I whitelist your sending address?

subject: I need to change my profile picture
body: I want to upload a new profile picture. Where is the setting to upload and save the new image?

subject: Why was my subscription cancelled?
body: I did not initiate a cancellation, but my account status shows 'Pending Cancellation'. I need this rectified.

subject: Payment issue: Need a temporary suspension of charges
body: I'm having a temporary issue with my bank account and need to pause the automatic charges for one month. Is this possible?

subject: How to report abuse in the community forum
body: Another user is posting inappropriate content. How can I report them and their posts?

subject: Feature request: Custom reports generation
body: We need the ability to generate custom data reports with specified metrics and date ranges.

subject: Bug: Notifications are broken
body: I am not receiving any in-app or email notifications for account activity even though they are enabled in my settings.

subject: Where is the documentation for ZAP integration?
body: I'm trying to connect your service to Zapier but need a step-by-step guide on the correct process.

subject: Unexpected charge amount
body: I was charged $15 more this month than last month for the same plan. Why is there an increased charge?

subject: Trouble logging in after security warning
body: I received a security warning email about unusual activity. Now I can't log in. Is my account blocked?

subject: Password reset link expired due to time zone difference
body: I am traveling and the reset link expired quickly. It might be due to a time zone issue. Can this be fixed?

subject: Resend activation email to new address
body: I used the wrong email address to sign up. Can you resend the activation email to my correct address: correct@example.com?

subject: How to switch back to my previous plan
body: I mistakenly upgraded my plan and want to switch back to my previous tier. How can I downgrade immediately?

subject: Card marked as 'expired' but is valid
body: The system is saying my card is expired, but the date is next year. Can you manually verify the card details?

subject: Need to remove an old team member
body: An employee left the company. I need to know how to remove them from my team's account access immediately.

subject: Request: Option to manually clear cache
body: It would be useful to have a button in the app settings to clear the local application cache for troubleshooting.

subject: Bug: Search results are inconsistent
body: Searching for an exact phrase in quotes is sometimes returning irrelevant results or failing to find a known document.

subject: What is the security policy?
body: I'm concerned about security. Where can I read about your platform's security best practices and compliance?

subject: My account was deactivated by mistake
body: My account was marked as 'inactive' and deactivated. I need it recovered as soon as possible.

subject: Can't log in after enabling 2FA
body: I enabled two-factor authentication, and now the backup codes and the app codes don't work. I'm completely locked out.

subject: Password reset link not arriving (Hotmail)
body: I've tried resetting my password multiple times. I'm using a Hotmail account and the email is never delivered.

subject: Missing email verification link after sign-up
body: I successfully signed up, but the account is unusable because I haven't received the verification link to activate it.

subject: Question about current usage limits
body: I want to check how close I am to hitting my plan's usage limits for storage and bandwidth. Where can I view these metrics?

subject: Card decline during a large payment
body: I'm trying to pay a large annual fee, and the card is being declined. It might be my bank's fraud protection.

subject: How to change the time zone setting
body: The displayed times for all events are wrong. I need to change my account's time zone setting to PST.

subject: Feature request: Integration with Slack
body: An integration that posts notifications about new activity directly into a Slack channel would be fantastic.

subject: Bug: App crash when trying to access Billing History
body: Whenever I click on 'Billing History' in the account settings, the entire application shuts down unexpectedly.

subject: How to contact the sales team?
body: I'm interested in the Enterprise plan but need to speak to a sales representative first. How do I get in touch?

subject: Trouble with browser compatibility (old version of Edge)
body: I'm using an older version of Microsoft Edge and the entire interface looks jumbled. Is my browser supported?

subject: Login failed after clearing browser cache
body: I cleared my browser's cache to fix a display issue, and now I can't log in at all. It keeps rejecting my credentials.

subject: Need to manually resend password reset email
body: I clicked the link 20 minutes ago but it wasn't valid. Please trigger another password reset link to my account.

subject: Still awaiting verification email 3 days later
body: It's been 3 days since I signed up and no verification email. I can't access my account. What is the delay?

subject: How to download last year's invoices in bulk
body: I need to download all the invoices from the previous fiscal year for tax purposes. Can I download them all at once?

subject: Payment issue: I need to use PayPal instead of credit card
body: I want to switch my recurring payment method from my credit card to my verified PayPal account. How do I do this?

subject: How to recover a deleted account
body: I accidentally deleted my account last month. Is it possible to recover the account and the associated data?

subject: Feature suggestion: More storage options
body: I need a minor increase in storage without upgrading to the next tier. Could you offer a small storage add-on purchase?

subject: Bug report: Error 503 on data processing
body: I receive an 'Error 503 Service Unavailable' message whenever I try to run a heavy data processing task.

subject: Can I re-subscribe easily after cancelling?
body: I cancelled my subscription a few weeks ago but now want to rejoin the service. Can I reactivate my old account?

subject: The application keeps timing out
body: The system frequently times out, and I have to log in repeatedly. My internet connection is stable.
